thread.title: Virgin America To Hold Live Webcast Of Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results
thread.title_full: Virgin America To Hold Live Webcast Of Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Virgin America To Hold Live Webcast Of Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results
text:
Virgin America
SAN FRANCISCO , Oct. 16, Virgin America Inc. (NASDAQ: VA) will announce its Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results on Thursday, October 29 , 2015. The Company will hold a live webcast to discuss the results, details as follows:
When :
Thursday, October 29, 2015 at 8.00 a.m. PT/11.00 a.m. ET.
Who :
President and Chief Executive Officer, David Cush
Chief Financial Officer, Peter Hunt
Web address :
The webcast will be available at: http://ir.virginamerica.com
Replay :
A replay will be available within 24 hours of the webcast and will be archived on the company's website for a period of time.
Photos and broadcast quality b-roll of Virgin America's unique aircraft are available here .
About Virgin America: Known for its mood-lit cabins, three beautifully designed classes of service and innovative fleetwide amenities - like touch-screen personal entertainment, WiFi and power outlets at every seat, Virgin America has earned a host of awards since launching in 2007 - including being named both the "Best U.S. Airline" in Cond√© Nast Traveler's Readers' Choice Awards for the past seven consecutive years and "Best Domestic Airline" in Travel + Leisure's World's Best Awards for the past eight consecutive years. For more: www.virginamerica.com
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20090123/VIRGINAMERICALOGO
